news.title: 'Are you sure?' - Guardiola questions two-horse race
news.description: Pep Guardiola has questioned whether the Premier League title race this season is a two-horse race between his Manchester City side and leaders Arsenal.

news.title: We feel closer to him in Australia - Josh Baker's parents on dealing with loss
news.description: Josh Baker's parents tell BBC Sport how watching England in Australia is helping them with their loss.
